messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a state park. From the entrance you have two choices, an area with oak trees and an area with redwood trees. You go to oak trees area which leads to highline trail. You walk on the trail to find a creek which the leads to a cypress tree. There is a dock under cypress tree from where take a ferry that leads to an island. You see a chest in the island. You open it and there is a copper ring, but you do not take it, you're just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. This time at the entrance you choose the area with redwood trees. Under that tree you see a grove trail which leads to a mountain. You climb the mountain to find a sequoia tree on top through which there is a zipline which leads to wildflower valley. You see a chest in the valley with a gold necklace, but you do not take anything, you're just learning about the environment. You return to the entrance. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most valuable jewelry. Which place from the entrance. Which area from the entrance will lead to the path where one can find the most valuable jewelry?

You are a person that wants to be fit. The user sets a weight goal and you give him an advice.
user: I'm getting in shape. From the start I was just doing cardio every other day. In the evening. I did sit-ups and push ups. I did not go to sleep on time. Now I have lost 3 pounds. I feel a little tired and I'm going to have to sleep on time now.
You are a doctor that must write a note.
You are a sales representative. Your task is to recommend a product to the client so he would buy it the next day.
user: I would like to recommend one of to go for a trip with my wife. I would recommend [to go] for a walk.
You are a customer service representative. You must answer the most frequently asked questions.
answer1: Hello, how can I?
answer2: Can I have a phone number?
answer3: Hi, I would you to be honest, the wait isn't too long since it's the weekend.
answer4: No can I have two?
answer5: Let me ask my manager [if I can get that done for you].
answer6: You can choose any one.
You are a journalist. You write a report.
user: On the 2nd of December the city council met for a meeting. It was chaired by the mayor.
You are a person who orders a pizza.
user: I would like to order a slice of peperoni pizza and a medium Pepsi.
2) Ask
You are a sales rep. You have a list of product features of one of your products.
user: Hey! Is the product having [ABC]?
You are a doctor and see a patient with fever. You give your advice on what medicine to take.
user: I think you have to take paracetamol four times a day every two hours till the fever is gone.
You are an auto mechanic and see an oil leak. You need to tell the user how to fix the vehicle.
user: Hey, what would I do to fix that?
You make a video of a product and share it online.
user: I share this picture of [product] on Instagram.
user: I would be so happy to get a response from you.
You're a person

At the entrance, you meet a genie who can transport to any area of your choice but you have to clearly say which area of the park you want to go to. Remember that You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most valuable jewelry. Which area from the entrance will lead to the path where one can find the most valuable jewelry?

Oak trees with Redwood trees
You meet a friend and want to give her a tour through the park you're in. You need to tell her the information about the park.
user: Imagine it, you are sitting under the oak tree. The cypress tree is over there, and next to that tall tree there is a big mountain. The mountain contains a gold chest in it, but you did not take anything, you're just learning about the environment. Then you walk to the entrance, and then you go back home with your friend, and tell her everything about the park.
If you need more instructions, you can read more on the website.
You need to write your script in the comment section.

The mountain contains a gold chest in it, but you did not take anything, you're just learning about the environment. Then you walk to the entrance, and then you go back home with your friend, and tell her everything about the park.
